name: Compound name
abstract: A multiple part name, consisting of a set of strings with functional roles that can be combined into single string using a template.

examples.title: Example Compound Name
examples.content: A name with a label, but also a set of parts with roles that can be validated against content rules.

annotatedSchema:
$schema: https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema
description: Compound Name
properties:
  label:
    anyOf:
    - type: 'null'
    - type: string
    x-jsonld-id: http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label
  template:
    type: string
  hasPart:
    type: array
    items:
      type: object
      properties:
        label:
          type: string
          x-jsonld-id: http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label
        type:
          type: string
          x-jsonld-id: '@type'
      required:
      - label
    x-jsonld-id: http://purl.org/dc/terms/hasPart
x-jsonld-extra-terms:
  name: http://purl.org/dc/terms/title
x-jsonld-prefixes:
  dct: http://purl.org/dc/terms/
  rdfs: http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#
